actionTemplate.title: Smoky Eyeshadow
steps: Pack a deep shade along the lash line and blend upward
Use a transition shade to expand into the crease (lighter on top)
Extend and elongate the outer corner for a smoky shape
Clean edges and brighten inner corner to keep it crisp

rationaleTemplate: Creates rich dimension with a controlled dark-to-light fade.
Great for evening or photo looks; boosts depth and drama.
